nodes.text: This male individual was the father of Resistance pilot Tallissan Lintra. Lintra learned the basics of piloting from behind the controls of an RZ-1 A-wing interceptor that was used by her father as a cropduster on their farm on Pippip 3. Around the time of the Evacuation of D'Qar, Tallie wore a synthsilk scarf that was gifted to her by her father.
